productAttributes.productDescription: Compact, affordable and effective air purifier for home and small offices. Very effective to combat air pollution in cities and to prevent asthma, allergy and air borne infections. Helps keep air fresh and free of bad odor, dust, mildew and pollen. Recommended for rooms upto 150 Sq. Ft. in size. Easy to install and operate - works on regular 5 Amps socket. Has advanced 7-stage air purification technology including pre-filter to remove coarse particles, HEPA filter for fine dust particles upto 0.3 Micron small, cold catalyst for removing harmful gases from air, UV light for removing infection causing microbes bacteria, virus, fungi, Activated Carbon to remove bad odor and gases like Hydrogen Sulphide, Ammonia and Formaldehyde and Negative Ion generator for forest fresh air. Also has optional Aroma diffuser. Also has LED display and Remote Control with multiple operating modes.
productAttributes.title: Atlanta Healthcare Tornado Pure 7-Stage Portable Compact Air Purifier White

productAttributes.productDescription: The Ualpine'S Multi-Action Tru-Air Purification Process, Featuring The Ioncluster Technology, Purifies Your Surroundings And Provides Clean, Fresh Air For Easier Breathing To Enhance Your Family'S Respiratory Well-Being. The Ualpine With Its 360? Surround Air Flow Design Ensures Purification Reaches Its Full Potential By Effectively Circulating Clean, Purified Air Evenly In The Room. Equipped With A Smart Air Quality Sensor, The Ualpine Automatically Monitors The Air Quality Of The Room When In 'Auto' Mode And Provides A Quick Indication Through The Display Of Different Coloured Lights. It Will Then Adjust The Rate Of Purification Accordingly With The Different Fan Speed Selections Lo, Mid, Hi To Ensure Effective Purification.
productAttributes.title: Osim OS-630 Portable Table Top Air Purifier Beige

Easy operation, no special maintenance. Advantages 1. Beautiful shape as wonderful gift. 2. Effective sterilization & odor-removing. 3. Energy-saving & long shelf-life. 4. Very easy maintenance. productAttributes.productDescription: Features Slim Design Silent Operation Maintenance Free Easy to use Negative ions and Ozone are nature's way of cleaning the air we breathe outside.The product produces both negative ions and ozone to replicate this phenomenon,resulting in cleaner , fresher breathable air indoors.The unit may help in the removal of indoor air contaminants such as : dust ,odors,mould & mildew, germs & bacteria. Maintenance The center ozone output ring has a small ceramic white tube in the middle. This should be cleaned every 4 weeks with a cotton bud. Do not use water , just a dry cotton bud.Only wipe around the front edges of the ozone tube..

productAttributes.productDescription: Negative ions and Ozone are nature's way of cleaning the air we breathe outside.This occurs during a thunder storm, causing the outdoor air to be abundant with negative ions and ozone.This occurs during a thunder storm, causing the outdoor air to be abundant with negative ions and ozone. The T02C produces both negative ions and ozone to be replicate this phenomenon, resulting in cleaner, fresher breathable air indoors.The T02C may help in the removal of dust, smoke , odours , mould , mildew, germs,bacteria , viruses, and TVOC's. Maintenance The only maintenance required is the cleaning the filter in the base of the unit.Simply remove the circular cover,take out the filter, clean the filter with brusher or vaccum and replace in the unit.This should be carried out every 1-2 months.

Several other proven health benefits of negative ions are available on the web. It can be applied at homes, offices, living room, bathroom, kitchen, wardrobe and cabinets. Benefits: Reduces dust, smoke, foul odor, exhaust fumes, radiation, germs + viruses and even the harmful effects of electromagnetic field. Enjoy the luxury of fresh and clean air with flair. productAttributes.productDescription:
The Morphy Richards Mirage 200 is a steam iron designed for an effortless ironing experience. The soleplate of this steam iron is crafted for frictionless gliding over the fabric. The Morphy Richards Mirage 200 has an ergonomic handle with comfortable grip for easy manoeuvrability.

This steam iron measures 27 x 15 x13 cm and weighs 1.2 kg. The Morphy Richards Mirage 200 features a swivel cord with 360 degree cord freedom for free left and right movement. This swivel cord reduces pressure on your palm and wrist during extended ironing sessions.

Steam Features

This iron comes with variable steam control which allows you to set different steam levels according to your requirement. The Morphy Richards Mirage 200 features steam burst for tough creases and vertical steam to press hanging blazer and jacket. The spray system of the Morphy Richards Mirage 200 releases fine mist through your clothes and helps remove stubborn creases.

The Morphy Richards Mirage 200 has an anti-drip system for stain free ironing. The self-clean function of this steam iron flushes out the scale build-up and gives longer life to the iron. It is recommended to use the self-cleaning function at least once a month.

Safety and Power

 The maximum power consumption of the Morphy Richards Mirage 200 steam iron is 1320 W. This appliance requires a power of 230 V to function. The temperature pilot light in the Mirage 200 aids in thermostatic operations. This light glows to indicate that the iron is switched on and goes off when the iron has reached the required temperature and is ready to use.

Note: To avoid leakage of water through the steam vents, please fill the water tank, switch off the steam and plug in. Once the iron is heated for 20-30 seconds the steam can be switched on.
productAttributes.title: Morphy Richards Mirage 200 Blue

Features

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Havells Digisteam is a steam iron with a lot of special features and designed for comfort. The PTFE Non-stick coated soleplate of the Havells Digisteam glides smoothly over your fabric. This Non-stick soleplate prevents your clothes from sticking to the iron in case of overheating. The handle of this dry iron has a soft grip for ironing comfort. The swivel cord of the Havells Digisteam has a 360 degree cord freedom for easy manoeuvring. In times of extended ironing hours, this swivel cord reduces the pressure on your palm and wrist.

Steam Features

 The Backlit LCD display on the Havells Digisteam helps in easy fabric selection. This Havells appliance also has an electronic temperature control to set variable temperatures for different kind of fabrics. The Havells Digisteam has a large 300 ml see through water tank with maximum level indication.

The Havells Digisteam iron has a spray system that releases fine mist through your clothes. The burst of steam in this Havells steam iron has both horizontal and vertical functions. The Havells Digisteam features an anti-drip system for stain free ironing results. The self-clean anti calc function on this Havells device reduces the efforts of manual descaling. Using this function at least once a month prolongs the life of your iron.

Safety and Power

The 2 way auto shut off on the Havells Digisteam iron gives double safety. This auto shut off feature cuts off the power to the iron when it is left unattended on the heel for 15 minutes and on the soleplate for 30 seconds. The red light will glow to indicate that the power is on and the green light later indicates that iron has reached the required temperature and is ready to use. This red light does not glow until the fabric select button is pressed to select the kind of fabric.

The Havells steam iron consumes a maximum power of 2000 W. It is preferred to use an iron with high power wattage for fast heating and better performance. The power required for the smooth functioning of the iron is 240 V.

Note: To avoid leakage of water through the steam vents, please fill the water tank, switch off the steam and plug in. Once the iron is heated for 20-30 seconds the steam can be switched on.
productAttributes.title: Havells Digi Steam Steam Iron

productAttributes.productDescription:
The secret behind your immaculate appearance – a fine balance of your impeccable dressing sense and the effectiveness of the Philips GC2840 Iron that is built for dependability.

Build

The Iron comes with Philips’ premium-make SteamGlide soleplate for smooth gliding over any cloth regardless of the material with 2200 W of power enabling a constant high steam output to make it easier to slide and smoothen. With a drip stop system in place, the iron also ensures that the steam does not stain the garment that you are ironing. It also comes with calc buster pills that break down calc so that it is easier to flush way.

Performance

Ensuring that creases are in a straight line and wrinkles are a thing of the past, the Philips iron employs 32 g/min of steam and 100 g steam boosts to reduce manual efforts to get clothing in smart conditions.

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Havells Admire is a steam iron made for great ironing experience. The PTFE Non-stick coated soleplate of this steam iron glides smoothly over the fabric. In times of overheating, this soleplate prevents your fabric from sticking to the iron. This Havells iron features a handle with soft grip for comfortable ironing. The swivel cord on this Havells Admire steam iron has a 360 degree cord freedom for easy manoeuvring. This swivel cord reduces the pressure on your palm and wrist during extended ironing hours.

Steam Features

 This Havells Admire steam iron has an extra-large see through water tank with 320 ml capacity. The spray system on this iron penetrates a fine mist through your clothes and aids you in removing wrinkles. The steam burst on the Havells Admire helps you remove stubborn creases with minimum efforts. The vertical steam function of the Havells Admire helps you press hanging fabric like curtains.

The easy grip temperature control dial of this Havells iron helps you set variable temperatures for different kinds of fabric. Higher temperature is recommended for the dresses with a lot of creases and lower temperatures for your delicate materials. The self-clean feature of the Havells Admire steam iron flushes out the scale particles from the steam chamber. This function reduces the efforts of manual descaling.

Safety and Power

The Havells Admire steam iron has a temperature pilot light for thermostatic operational safety. This light indicates when the iron has reached the required temperature and is ready to use. The maximum power consumption of this steam iron is 1400 W. It is preferred to use an iron with high power wattage for fast heating. This Havells appliance requires a power of 230 V for smooth functioning.

Note: To avoid leakage of water through the steam vents, please fill the water tank, switch off the steam and plug in. Once the iron is heated for 20-30 seconds the steam can be switched on.
productAttributes.title: Havells Admire Steam Iron Blue

productAttributes.productDescription: Introducing the Auto Steam Pro from Russell Hobbs :If building piles of ironing was an Olympic sport most of us would be going for gold. If you are an ironing dodger, help is at hand thanks to the product designers at Russell Hobbs who are dedicated to making light work of even the most mundane domestic chores. The Auto Steam Pro is easy-to-handle and its size, design and capabilities include a non-stick ceramic soleplate that glides effortlessly through even stubborn creases. Wrinkles in denim, linen and cotton can be tackled by the iron?s automatic stream generation. It has an automatic steam function and its 320ml water tank can generate 45g of continuous steam or a mega-120g shot of steam. As well as steam, the Auto Pro has dry, spray and burst functions and an easy-to-operate temperature dial so you are firmly in control. Your ironing?s best friend: That chore you once braced yourself for can actually be a pleasure as you?ll get through it in no time, imagine the satisfaction. It has an anti-drip feature so you wont soak your clothing, floor or flex and, because it is transparent, you can see how much water you are putting into it so you know when to stop. It has an anti-calcium function and is self-cleaning so you dont have to worry about ?build-up? compromising its power, For additional security, the iron has a non-slip heel so there?s no danger of it sliding out of the ironing board cradle. An extra long 3m power cord allows you to put your ironing board up anywhere you like so you can watch TV while you iron ? or you could even take the ironing outdoors on glorious summer days.

productAttributes.productDescription: Ironing perfection and safety day after day with Philips Azur. Designed for perfection with heat resistant storage box. Optimal design and weight of this Azur iron allows you to glide easily on all garments and reach into the trickiest areas. Built for optimal performance on a daily basis, this iron will not let you down. Together with its powerful steam performance and its new SteamGlide soleplate, for constant high steam output, it gives you all you need for perfect results. This range is designed to provide long lasting results and faster crease removal. Features: Powerful steam for faster crease removal, Steam output is measured in grams of weight as it leaves the soleplate. The heavier the output the deeper the steam can reach into the fabric layers for longer lasting crease removal. This steam iron has a powerful continuous steam output of 50g per minute for consistently fast results and a 200g steam boost for deep crease removal. Thanks to the carefully crafted soleplate design, the steam is distributed evenly across the soleplate. This way you need fewer ironing strokes to evenly moisten the garment and therefore less time to complete the ironing. Vertical Steam: The iron can be used vertically and the steam is powerful enough to be used to iron out creases from curtains or hanging clothes for example suit jackets or dresses that might need a refresh. SteamGlide soleplate: SteamGlide soleplate is a great Philips soleplate for your steam iron. It has great scratch resistance, glides perfectly and is easy to clean. Precision steam tip: The steam tip of this Philips iron, combines a particularly pointed front of the soleplate with special elongated steam slots in the tip, to reach right into the smallest and most difficult areas for the best ironing results. Drip stop system: Drip Stop system lets you iron delicate fabrics at low temperatures without having to worry about stains from water droplets. Double Active Calc System: Double Active Calc system of your Philips steam iron prevents scale build-up through anti scale pills and an easy to use calc clean function. Safety Auto Off: Iron shuts off automatically when in one of three following situations; the iron is held still for 30 seconds on soleplate, 30 seconds lying on a side or standing on its heel rest for 8 minutes. productAttributes.productDescription:
The Sunflame Opal is a dry iron with a stylish look designed for an effortless ironing experience. The Sunflame Opal dry iron is made from Teflon-coated soleplate. This soleplate is finely grounded to give best ironing results. The Sunflame Opal dry iron is light in weight which makes it easily portable. The handle of this dry iron is comfortable to hold and ergonomic.

Features

 The shock-proof body of the Sunflame Opal dry iron protects you by preventing electric shock. The Sunflame Opal dry iron has an adjustable temperature control dial for ironing all kind of fabrics. Your clothes with a lot of creases would need high temperatures and low temperatures would be suitable for some delicate materials. If you find it difficult to select the required temperature, then determine the temperature by first ironing a part of your dress that will not be visible when you wear it.

Safety and Power

 This Sunflame Opal dry iron features an indicator light which helps in thermostatic operations. This light will show when the iron is ready to use by acquiring the temperature required. The Sunflame Opal consumes a maximum power of 750 W. Appliances with high power wattage are preferred for better performance.
productAttributes.title: Sunflame Opal Dry Iron

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Morphy Richards Mirage 200 is a steam iron which offers a lot of features for a great ironing experience. The soleplate of this steam iron is designed to deliver a frictionless, gliding effect over the fabric. The Morphy Richards Mirage 200 has an ergonomic handle for easy manoeuvrability.

The dimensions of this Morphy Richards iron are 27 x 15 x 13 cm and weigh 1.2 kg. The Morphy Richards Mirage 200 features a 360 degree swivel cord for unhindered movement. This swivel cord reduces the pressure on your wrist and palm during extended ironing sessions.

Steam Features

 The spray system on the Mirage 200 produces a fine mist that penetrates deep into your clothes to remove wrinkles. The Morphy Richards Mirage 200 has a variable steam control to set optimized steam output for different fabrics. The steam burst feature on this Morphy Richards iron helps you remove stubborn creases.

The vertical steam option of the Morphy Richards Mirage 200 helps you press hanging clothes without any hassle. The self-clean function on this steam iron flushes the scale and mineral build-up from the steam chamber. Using this function at least once a month gives longer life to your iron. The Morphy Richards Mirage 200 features an anti-drip system for stain free ironing.

Safety and Power

The pilot light on the Morphy Richards Mirage 200 helps in thermostatic operations. This light goes off when the required temperature is reached and the iron is ready to use. The maximum power consumption of this Morphy Richards steam iron is 1320 W. This iron requires a power of 230 V for efficient functioning.

Note: To avoid leakage of water through the steam vents, please fill the water tank, switch off the steam and plug in. Once the iron is heated for 20-30 seconds the steam can be switched on.
productAttributes.title: Morphy Richards Mirage 200 Steam Iron with Spray Green

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Bajaj MX 11 is a classy looking steam iron that offers you a lot of special features. This steam iron is made from light weight plastic for easy portability. The Bajaj MX 11 has a Non-stick coated soleplate which prevents fabric from sticking to the iron during overheating and ensures the safety of your clothes. This Bajaj steam iron has an ergonomic handle for easy manoeuvrability and comfortable grip.

Steam Features

 The Bajaj MX 11 has a fine spray system that gets through your clothes evenly and makes it easy to remove tough wrinkles. This Bajaj device has a variable steam control which allows you to set different steam options for your clothes. The continuous steam output of this iron is 15 g/m.

The special steam burst function of Bajaj MX 11 passes a burst of steam through your clothes which helps you remove stubborn creases. The self-clean feature of this Bajaj appliance saves you the effort of manual descaling.

Safety and Power

The power consumption of Bajaj MX 11 steam iron is 1200 W. This allows for shorter warm up time, thus saving on time and electricity. This iron features a pilot light for the thermostatic operations which indicates when the iron has reached the required temperature and is ready to use.

Note: To avoid leakage of water through the steam vents, please fill the water tank, switch off the steam and plug in. Once the iron is heated for 20-30 seconds the steam can be switched on.
productAttributes.title: Bajaj MX 11 Steam Iron

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Philips GC1621 is a stylish looking steam iron made from light weight material for easy portability. This steam iron has Golden American Heritage soleplate which glides easily over any kind of fabric. The handle of this Philips GC1621 steam iron is designed to be held comfortably without straining your palm or wrist.

Steam Features

 The Philips GC1621 has a water tank capacity of 170 ml. The unique feature of this water tank is that it can be detached from the iron for easy filling and emptying of water. This Philips iron features a spray function which produces fine mist on the fabric to remove creases easily.

The steam vents in this Philips appliance are distinctively designed to produce a continuous steam of 15 g/m. The Philips GC1621 has a steam boost output of 250 g which helps in removing the stubborn creases out of the fabric. The calc management system in this Philips steam iron is easy to use and suitable for all kinds of tap water. The Philips GC1621 comes with double calc clean solution which is a liquid that prevents scale build-up through anti scale pills.

Safety and Power

The Philips GC1621 requires a power of 240 V. The maximum power consumption of this steam iron is 1200 W which enables constant steam output and fast heating.

Note: To avoid leakage of water through the steam vents, please fill the water tank, switch off the steam and plug in. Once the iron is heated for 20-30 seconds the steam can be switched on.
productAttributes.title: Philips GC1621 Steam Iron White with Orange

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Inalsa Sapphire is a dry iron designed for an effortless ironing experience. The Non-stick coated soleplate of the Inalsa Sapphire dry iron will smooth out creases easily. This Non-stick coated soleplate does not allow your fabric to stick to the iron in case of any overheating. The Inalsa Sapphire dry iron has an elegant plastic handle with a cool touch feature. This plastic handle is ergonomic and prevents you from electric shocks. The swivel cord on the Inalsa Sapphire dry iron helps in free movement of the iron.

Features

 The temperature control knob on the Inalsa Sapphire dry iron allows you to set variable temperatures for different kind of fabrics. Higher temperatures are recommended for thick fabrics and lower temperatures for delicate materials. If you are unable to decide on the kind of fabric your dress is made of, then determine the accurate temperature by test-ironing a part of your dress that is not visible when you wear it.

Safety and Power

 The Inalsa Sapphire dry iron features a thermal fuse for additional safety. This fuse cuts off the power supply to the heating element during any electric malfunction. The maximum power consumption of the Inalsa Sapphire dry iron is 1000 W for an improved performance. It is preferable to use an iron with high power wattage for fast heating. The neon indicator light on this Inalsa dry iron notifies when the iron is ready to use by reaching the desired temperature. The voltage required for the Inalsa Sapphire dry iron to function smoothly is 230 V.
productAttributes.title: Inalsa Sapphire Dry Iron

This soleplate prevents your fabric from sticking to the iron in case of any overheating and ensures the safety of your clothes. The handle of this Inalsa appliance is ergonomic with comfortable handgrip. The swivel cord on the Inalsa Pearl dry iron is designed for easy manoeuvring.

Features

 The cool touch plastic body of the Inalsa Pearl dry iron does not allow the heat of the iron to penetrate to the body and keeps it cool. The Inalsa Pearl dry iron features a variable temperature control knob to adjust required temperature for each kind of fabric. Clothes with a lot of creases would require high temperatures whereas lower temperatures would be suitable for delicate materials.

Safety and Power

 The Inalsa Pearl dry iron features a special thermal fuse for total safety. This thermal fuse cuts off the power supply to the heating element during any electric malfunction. The neon indicator light on this Inalsa dry iron helps in thermostatic operations. This light indicates when the iron has reached the desired temperature and is ready to use. The maximum power consumption of the Inalsa Pearl dry iron is 1000 W for fast heating. The voltage of power required by this dry iron is 230 V.
productAttributes.title: Inalsa Pearl Dry Iron White and Blue

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Philips GC1015 is a steam iron designed for an effortless ironing experience. This steam iron has a Linished coated soleplate which is made from thin aluminium to aid faster heating. This soleplate features a speed shaped streamlined design to allow quicker manoeuvring. The vent design on the Philips GC1015 steam iron ensures uniform heating and minimises the chance of burning your fabric. The handle of this Philips steam iron has a comfortable grip for a relaxed ironing experience.

Steam Features

 The water tank capacity of this Philips iron is 150 ml. The spray function on the Philips GC1015 produces a fine mist that moistens the fabric making it easier to iron out stubborn creases. This Philips steam iron has a continuous steam output of 15 g/m for powerful crease removal.

The Philips GC1015 has an integrated calc clean function suitable for all kinds of tap water. The calc clean function flushes the iron to remove scale build up, thereby extending the life of your steam iron.

Safety and Power

 The maximum power consumption of Philips GC1015 is 1200 W. It is preferred to use an iron with high power wattage as it helps in faster heating. This Philips appliance requires a power of 220 V for smooth functioning. The Philips GC 1015 has an Iron temperature-ready light for thermostatic operations. Put the main plug in an earthed socket, when the temperature light goes out, wait for 8-10 seconds before you start ironing.

Note: To avoid leakage of water through the steam vents, please fill the water tank, switch off the steam and plug in. Once the iron is heated for 20-30 seconds the steam can be switched on.
productAttributes.title: Philips GC1015 Steam Iron White and blue

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Sunflame Platina is a dry iron sleekly designed for great ironing experience. The Teflon-coated soleplate of this dry iron glides smoothly over the fabric. This soleplate ensures the safety of your clothes. The handle of this Sunflame dry iron is ergonomic and has a comfortable grip. The Sunflame Platina is made from lightweight plastic for ironing comforts and easy portability. The main power cord is centrally placed for easy manoeuvring.

Features

 The adjustable temperature control on the Sunflame Platina iron helps you set variable temperature for different kind of fabrics. Clothes with a lot of creases will require high temperatures, whereas lower temperatures would be suitable for delicate materials. The shock-proof body of the Sunflame Platina dry iron is made in such a way that it protects you by preventing electric shock.

Safety and Power

 The maximum power consumption of the Sunflame Platina dry iron is 1000 W. It is recommended to use an iron which has high power wattage for fast heating. The pilot light on this Sunflame dry iron helps in thermostatic operations. This light indicates when the iron has acquired the necessary temperature and is ready to use.
productAttributes.title: Sunflame Platina Dry Iron

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Bajaj DX3 Light Weight Iron is a dry iron specially designed for effortless ironing results. The Non-stick coated soleplate of this Bajaj appliance glides smoothly over the fabric. This soleplate also prevents your clothes from sticking to the iron in case of any overheating. The handle of the Bajaj DX3 dry iron has a comfortable grip for easy manoeuvrability.

Features

 The Reliable snap-action thermostat of the Bajaj DX3 Light Weight Iron is a special feature that helps curb the energy costs. The Bajaj DX3 dry iron features instant heating technology which saves time and electricity.

This Bajaj DX3 iron has multiple temperature levels to set certain temperature for each kind of fabric. A cotton dress with a lot of wrinkles might require higher temperature whereas; the delicate materials might need lower temperatures. If you do not know what kind of fabrics your clothes are made of, then determine the required temperature by ironing a part of your dress that is not visible when you wear it.

Safety and Power

 This Bajaj appliance has a temperature indication light for thermostatic operations. This light indicates when the iron has reached the required temperature and ready to use. The maximum power consumption of Bajaj DX3 Light Weight Iron is 1000 W. It is preferred to use irons with higher wattage for faster heating. This dry iron needs a power of 230 V to function.
productAttributes.title: Bajaj DX 3 L/W Dry Iron White

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Philips GC1010 is a steam iron with a Linished soleplate which is speed shaped for effortless ironing. The soleplate of this steam iron is made from thin aluminium for rapid and better heating of the iron. The Philips GC1010 has a special vent design for producing uniform steam to the fabric. This Philips appliance has an ergonomic handle for comfortable grip.

Steam Features

The water tank capacity of the Philips GC1010 steam iron is 150 ml. The spray function of this Philips iron uniformly spreads the mist through your fabric and helps to remove tough creases. The steam function of the Philips GC1010 steam iron has three steam setting options for convenience. This Philips device has a continuous steam output of 15 g/m for great ironing experience.

The Philips GC1010 has an amazing calc management system which is self-clean. The calc function of this iron helps to simply flush the iron to remove calc particles out of the iron. This function also extends the life of the iron.

Safety and Power

 The maximum power consumption of Philips GC1010 is 1200 W. The electrical energy required by this steam iron is 220 V. There is a special temperature-ready light in this Philips iron that indicates the thermostatic controls. This light automatically goes off when the required temperature for iron is reached and is ready to use.

Note: To avoid leakage of water through the steam vents, please fill the water tank, switch off the steam and plug in. Once the iron is heated for 20-30 seconds the steam can be switched on.
productAttributes.title: Philips GC1010 Steam Iron Green

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Inalsa Adria is a steam iron which offers a lot of features for ironing comforts. The Inalsa Adria is made from Non-stick coated soleplate for smooth ironing. In times of overheating, this soleplate does not allow the fabric to stick to the iron. This Inalsa steam iron features a 360 degree swivel cord that enables free movement of the iron in all directions. The anti-skid base on the Inalsa Adria steam iron helps you place the iron correctly during and after use.

Steam Features

 The water tank in this Inalsa steam iron has a water level indicator for your convenience. The cord winder on the Inalsa Adria steam iron aids in coiling the main power cord to help in the storage of iron. The unique spray function on this Inalsa Adria steam iron produces fine mist through your clothes making it easy to smooth out wrinkles. The Inalsa Adria steam iron has a special vertical ironing function that allows you to press hanging fabric like curtains.

The Inalsa Adria steam iron has both variable temperature control and variable steam control for the selection of different kind of fabrics. Higher temperatures would be suitable for thick fabrics and lower temperatures would be suitable for delicate materials. The self-clean function on the Inalsa Adria steam iron reduces the efforts of manual descaling. This special function flushes the iron to remove scale and mineral build-up in the steam chamber. Using this function regularly gives longer life to your iron.

Safety and Power

 The pilot light on the Inalsa Adria steam iron helps in thermostatic operational safety. The voltage of power required by this Inalsa appliance is 230 V. The Inalsa Adria steam iron consumes a maximum power of 1400 W. It is recommended to use an iron with high power wattage for fast heating.

Note: To avoid leakage of water through the steam vents, please fill the water tank, switch off the steam and plug in. Once the iron is heated for 20-30 seconds, the steam can be switched on.
productAttributes.title: Inalsa Adria Steam Iron

productAttributes.productDescription: Don't burn it, steam it Cut your ironing time in half, the powerful steam of PerfectCare makes light work on even the toughest fabrics. Ironing with Philips PerfectCare Aqua has never been quicker or easier, with just one temperature and steam setting for all ironable fabrics, no more adjustments or waiting. Don't burn it, steam it with 220g of powerful pressurised steam that provides fast results without the risk of burning your delicate outfits. PerfectCare Aqua is also very quick and easy to descale, so you can keep your iron working . What is OptimalTEMP technology? Optimal moisture and a heat of 130 degrees is required to remove all creases and iron effectively. PerfectCare, with its OptimalTEMP technology, offers the combination of high steam pressure with one optimal temperature that is safe for use on all ironable fabrics. OptimalTEMP has been made possible thanks to the cyclonic steam chamber and the control processor. The cyclonic steam chamber ensures that, at a gentle temperature, consistently high steam can be delivered at the push of a button, where other steam generators at the same temperature would leak or deliver little to no steam. The control processor keeps the soleplate at a consistent temperature at all times, which makes it safe to use on all ironable fabrics, never being too hot or too cold. Earlier irons used a hot soleplate alone as a means of removing creases and pressing garments. Later, the addition of a steam feature allowed for ironing with greater ease and speed, but required different temperature settings for different fabrics. Different temperature settings also interfered with the iron's ability to deliver steam. The higher the temperature, the more steam was possible, but the lower the temperature, the poorer the steam output. Because of this, all irons and steam generators work with a soleplate of up to 260 degrees to generate enough steam. Furthermore, the soleplate serves only to press fabric, not to remove creases, steam is most efficient for this job.
productAttributes.title: Philips GC8635 Steam Iron Blue
